sections.heading: Advertising6-504.AdvertisingA credit union shall not make, advertise, display, distribute, broadcast or televise, or cause or permit to be made, advertised, displayed, distributed, broadcast or televised, in any manner whatever any false, misleading or deceptive statement or representation
sections.text: Advertising6-504.AdvertisingA credit union shall not make, advertise, display, distribute, broadcast or televise, or cause or permit to be made, advertised, displayed, distributed, broadcast or televised, in any manner whatever any false, misleading or deceptive statement or representation.
